definitions.text: an energetic attempt to achieve something
examples: getting through the crowd was a real struggle
he fought a battle for recognition

definitions.text: an open clash between two opposing groups (or individuals); --Thomas Paine
examples: the harder the conflict the more glorious the triumph
police tried to control the battle between the pro- and anti-abortion mobs
the struggle to get through the crowd exhausted her

definitions.text: make a strenuous or labored effort
examples: She struggled for years to survive without welfare

definitions.text: to exert strenuous effort against opposition
examples: he struggled to get free from the rope

definitions.text: climb awkwardly, as if by scrambling
be engaged in a fight; carry on a fight
examples: Militant groups are contending for control of the country
